Name: Arafat
AboutMe:
• Exposure of over 10 years in software analysis, design and development for the completion of multiple projects for both small businesses and large enterprises.

• Proven strength in Java, .NET, Data Warehouses and Business Intelligence.

• Good analytical, design, architecture and development skills. Sound communication skills.

• Self-starter, highly dedicated, target oriented, hard-working and enthusiastic.

• Experience of managing large teams and multiple projects in parallel. Even single handedly developed and managed projects throughout their entire life cycle; demonstrated strength as “Project Manager”, “Technical Lead” and “Developer”.

• Used Agile SCRUM and Test Driven Development (TDD) for successful completion of multiple projects.

• Working as an offshore Project Manager of a cross-continental and remote teams. Responsible for all communication, deadlines and commitments.

Specialties: SOA, WCF, C#, NHibernate, ASP.NET, JAVA, Java Enterprise Edition, JSP, Swing, SQL Server, SSIS, JavaScript, Oracle, UML, HTML and XML.
